title: BRIEF-Greenergy Holdings Executed MoA With Rym Business Management And Certain Landowners
text:
BRIEF-Greenergy Holdings Executed MoA With Rym Business Management And Certain Landowners

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 09:24)

BRIEF-Greenergy Holdings Executed MoA With Rym Business Management And Certain Landowners Oct 16 (Reuters) - Greenergy Holdings Inc :

* EXECUTED MOA WITH RYM BUSINESS MANAGEMENT AND CERTAIN

LANDOWNERS

IN CONNECTION WITH AN INVESTMENT IN PRIME MEDIA HOLDINGS

* UNDER MOA, PROPERTIES IN, AMONG OTHERS, PROVINCE OF RIZAL

WILL

BE INVESTED TO PRIME IN EXCHANGE FOR PRIMARY COMMON SHARES



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX6vkGDT

Further company coverage: GREEN.PS





BRIEF-Greenergy Holdings Executed MoA With Rym Business Management And Certain Landowners
